WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
I am using asp.net with VB.net 
I have a column in db which stores the value in svg format
 
eg:<?xml version="1.0" standalone="no"?>
<!DOCTYPE svg PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD SVG 1.1//EN" 
"http://www.w3.org/Graphics/SVG/1.1/DTD/svg11.dtd">
 
<svg width="100%" height="100%" version="1.1"
xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
 
<rect width="300" height="100"
style="fill:rgb(0,0,255);stroke-width:1;
stroke:rgb(0,0,0)"/>
 
</svg>
 
 
I want to display this as image in webpage.
 
Can anyone please help me in doing this.
 
I tried a lot but not working.

Comments.Message:
Hmmm that's a good question. Looking through the code I haven't made a way to do this without modifying code unfortunately; the HTTP handler you would use will only display an image of an SVG document on disk. For some stupid reason I didn't make it extensible enough to be able to load from any source through inheritance!!

I've created work item #10260 with some details about this task. If you don't want to wait for this feel free to give me a shout and we can work on a solution to suit you faster.

Can you please help me out in doing this. I don't have to code for SVG.

Please help me in doing this.
